closing.text: Let's schedule a demo class so you can experience our teaching approach firsthand.
When would be a good time for you to attend a demo class? We offer both offline and online options.
Can I confirm that you'll be attending the demo class on [Date/Time]?
Based on our discussion, I believe our program aligns perfectly with your academic goals. Would you like to schedule a detailed consultation?
Our current batch has limited seats, and given your profile, I recommend reserving your spot immediately.
I'm confident we can help you achieve your academic objectives. Shall we discuss the next steps?
